summary: Most requested UI/UX changes appear implemented: a new gold/jade/emerald palette (theme variables + Tailwind colors), EnergyCapsule component for routine sections, ScoreRing portal effects (spark ring + pulse classes), Future Projection section with 3 panels and silhouette image, and micro-animations for supplements (wipe trigger) and training save (pulse trigger). Some requirements are not fully evidenced in the diff summary, notably the specific animated caustics/light-ray overlay implementation and inclusion/usage of the required overlay texture images, plus a localization issue in the Future Projection header.

missing_requirements.requirement: Subtle animated 'gold energy source' background overlay on Dashboard with slow drift and pointer-events disabled.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show the actual implementation of the fixed full-screen animated overlay layer (including pointer-events: none) nor any explicit Dashboard-only scoping. index.css is truncated right as Energy Capsule styles begin, so the caustics/light-ray overlay cannot be verified from provided evidence.

missing_requirements.requirement: Future Projection section label should respect existing German/English toggle where applicable.
missing_requirements.reason: The section title is hardcoded as "Future Projection" and does not use the isGerman toggle, while other panel titles/descriptions do toggle.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds an overlaid Lucide "User" icon on top of the requested silhouette outline in Future Projection panels.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-5 asks for a small elegant silhouette outline; it does not request an additional icon overlay. This is an extra visual element not specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Adds an optional numerical scale/marker bar UI above sliders ("Numerical Scale (Zahlenstrahl)") in GradientSlider.
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-6 requests sliders to feel fluid via micro-animations/transitions; it does not request adding a new scale/number line UI element.
